review_text: Incredible stay and hope to stay again. Beautiful home, grounds and spotless!

My wife and I spent four nights at Gary’s place. Everything we needed was there and Gary’s recommendations were spot on with regard to restaurants within 10mn drive. The place felt private and was very quiet. We will definitely book it again when we come back to the Eastern Shores.

Gary's place is just as described. A beautiful home, with lush and lovely landscaping. Check-in was super easy and check out was probably the easiest we've ever had at an Air Bnb. The bed and furniture was very comfortable, allowing us to sleep well. Definitely would recommend!
This location was perfect for our short stay. The property is beautiful and well maintained and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again if I was back in Cambridge.

Excellent stay in Cambridge for the 6 Pillars Century bike ride. I would definitely stay here again. Very convenient to Great March park and walking distance to the restaurants in downtown Cambridge. Very cozy 2 bedroom place with a living room and private entrance. Gary gave us great restaurant recommendations. Great hosts!
Communication was excellent and the space was perfect for our needs.

Gary and Hugo's place is in a peaceful, quiet neighborhood. It was exactly as described and SO clean. Both the king and twin beds were very comfortable, as well. The hosts were excellent at communicating with us before arriving and during our stay. They recommended a breakfast/lunch spot called The Blackwater Bakery and Cafe that was delicious! Would definitely stay again if we were back in the Cambridge area!
Great locations near downtown shops, bars and restaurants. Accommodations were very nice - two large bedrooms, comfy beds and very clean.

Gary was extremely responsive, flexible and friendly. His place was very peaceful with a beautiful garden and a chicken coup! It was fun to watch the chickens! His place was very clean and comfortable. Great beds and good recommendations for dinner.

My father and I spent 1 night at Gary's wonderful space and loved every aspect of it. The space was immaculate and wonderfully decorated.
The neighborhood was very walkable. We would love to come back and stay again. Thanks Gary!

Such a nice stay! The air bnb was very clean, cute/quaint, and relaxing! Easy parking and good location. Gary was a great host and made us feel welcome. Will definitely book again when I visit Cambridge in the future. :-)
The house was beautiful and very clean I would definitely stay there again!!
Exactly as described -- great location, very clean. Definitely recommend!
Gary and Hugo were great. They communicated well and were able to accommodate a non typical request
Gary’s place was clean and provided a good amount of privacy. Their pack yard was a treasure-wonderful plantings with places to sit—
Loved our stay! Gary & Hugo were excellent hosts. Beautiful setting & convenient location. Felt like we could make ourselves at home (& did). Would definitely stay again. What a treat!
Gary was very responsive and helpful. We booked his place for to watch the Ironman. We were able to have others join us during the day. The yard was stunning and the place was clean and comfortable.
Such a relaxing getaway! I especially loved the garden area. Thank you Gary and Hugo!

The location and the place was absolutely amazing. You are close to Ocean City MD, Baltimore and DC. The calmness and serenity, the water front and Light House was very impressive. The history of Herriot Tubman Underground Railroad museum is a must see. I was so at ahhh with the town and night life. I don’t think people really know about this town and history it’s amazing and my grandson learned so much even about Fredric Douglass born and raised in Eaton,MD. I will definitely come back again. The only thing Gary is missing is a full kitchen. Other than that, the place is a gem and goldmine.
The apartment was very nice and comfortable. Gary made us feel at home and the bed and amenities were great.

Location in Cambridge is older and nice--not central, but still walkable to the marina and nightlife establishments. Landscaping is well done. The back entrance was a little confusing, but once we saw the hand written sign designating the wrong door, we found the correct door. Using a rear entrance is a challenge, but they made it work. The price was a little high for the location, but at the time I didn't find any other options suitable for three or four people.
Amazing stay thank you
Lovely place to stay! Great hosts, very responsive.
Charming house, beautiful setting and a great, responsive host. Would love to be back again.

super cute backyard to enjoy when it's dark. all you hear are crickets. it was such a cute and quiet spot. the little town was pretty as well! we'll definitely stay again if we have the opportunity again!
The guest cottage was so lovely, spacious, and had plenty of amenities to accommodate our two night stay! Beautiful home and the garden was stunning! Highly recommend!

Such a beautiful place to stay! Love the private door entrance, the two rooms is very comfortable, the living room and the outside patio is nicely set up for us to enjoy. We greatly appreciate the extra towels in the linen closet for the guests. So close to everything, and we were able to biked to a boat race at Gerry Boyles Park. We will definitely stay here again.
Thanks Gary for your hospitality!
Rick, Pam and Pat.

Gary & Hugo were amazing! Extremely friendly and helpful. They went above and beyond anything I could have imagined to ensure my daughter and I had a great trip.
The place was exactly as described. Very clean and comfortable. But, their hospitality was the icing on the cake. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Thank you so much for everything and we will definitely be back!
Great place to rest your head for a night!

Gary and Hugo were extremely welcoming. We didn't need anything during our stay, but if we had, I know they would have gone out of their way to help. Beautiful accommodations and quite location. Would definitely recommend and would/will stay again when visiting Cambridge.

Gary was an excellent host and we really enjoyed our stay at his house. The two bedrooms were very spacious and thoughtfully furnished with lots of great books to read during our stay. The bathroom was clean, with lots of towels, which Gary refreshed midway through our stay. The street and the home were quiet, a great place to relax while being an easy walk to the restaurants of Cambridge and to the river. A special treat was the backyard and patio, which were beautifully landscaped and available for our use. We definitely want to come back to Cambridge to visit again!
Great place, very peaceful and comfortable!
Gary’s guest house was a great place to stay while visiting the area. Fantastic location with easy access to nearby restaurants and attractions. Gary was exceptionally diligent and accommodating.

We stayed at Gary's place during Eagleman 70.3. The place was just as described and super convenient to get to the race. Also Gary had great restaurant and grocery suggestions, and super flexible and helpful!!

We arrived and the instructions he left for us were easy to understand. We were only there for a quick night but the space was comfortable for us and our friends to enjoy a night away from home! Everything was clean and had what we needed. We will definitely return!
Gary’s place was amazing! The bed was so so comfortable. He had everything you would need, even an ice tray in the freezer!

Wonderful place - great location and we were very pleased! Stayed at Gary's place to explore Cambridge and St. Michaels. Gary had great suggestions for restaurants and was a pleasure to work with. The bedrooms are very roomy! I would stay again if in the area.
Thank you Gary.
Great hosts, very friendly. House was clean. Bed was so comfortable. Would come back.

Gary welcomed us into his home upon arrival. He was very friendly and offered great insights into the area. The house was beautiful and our apartment located in the back was very quiet and private. The apartment was extremely clean and the linens and bed we’re comfortable. We enjoyed having our morning coffee in the bright living room. The neighborhood was very quiet, flat, and perfectly located near the quaint downtown. Easton and Oxford are located right up the road as well as the Harriet Tubman museum that is worth checking out. We highly recommend Gary and Hugo’s place!

Had a wonderful stay at Gary’s place in Cambridge! The place was very clean and inviting! The bed was very comfortable. The outside garden was very peaceful! Loved being able to walk to see the water and walk into town! Would definitely recommend staying here!

Had a wonderful stay at Gary’s place in Cambridge! I stayed at his place for 1 night. The place was very clean and well kept. He has done a great job with the outside garden - my dad and I sat there and enjoyed our evening coffee while listening to the birds. Loved being able to walk to Gerry Boyle Park and walk into town. Gary provided great recommendations for local restaurants.
Gary’s place was clean and his directions were clear and easy to understand.
Gary’s house exceeded our expectations. His directions were spot on. We appreciated the ease of a door code. His place was clean and comfortable in a nice walkable area.
Gary was a great host. He was very friendly and had lots of recommendations. The place was so so clean. And a great location. Definitely stop by Shorelife store for some gifts!
Had a wonderful stay, host was great! Will stay again and recommend to friends and family.

Gary’s place is lovely and comfortable. Spacious and tastefully decorated, it’s in a lovely neighborhood in a cute town. Gary is super friendly and helpful to the perfect degree. We had a great stay and highly recommend!
Great quiet spot for the night

We had a perfect stay in Gary's guest suite! The bedrooms were well-appointed and spacious, and provided a perfect space to relax after a long day of exploring the Eastern Shore. Gary's home is an easy walk to downtown Cambridge, which we appreciated. Check-in and communication were both very easy, and we hope to be back to visit again soon!

Gary went above and beyond to ensure our visit was perfect. The accommodations were exactly as described and presented in photographs. The beds were beyond comfortable. The host and spouse lived in the bottom half of the home; however, we never heard them. Peaceful family room area with fabulous morning sunshine and a view of the very private yard (which we would have accessed in warmer weather). Would return in a heartbeat!
We loved our stay! Very clean and the most comfortable beds ever!

Highly recommend staying here. The set up was perfect. Private entrance, very comfortable beds, quiet rooms, and such a cute out door area. The street didn’t have a lot of traffic so there was no concern with getting around and most shops and restaurants were within walking distance.

Outstanding! This was a great find on a lovely street. A true 2 bedroom, 1 bath place with a separate sitting room and another area with a Keurig coffee machine and microwave. Very well furnished and the rooms were big. The place was spotless and very comfortable. Much better than a hotel. Gary had menus from local restaurants laid out and suggestions on making reservations, which turned out to be great advice. He was very warm and friendly. I plan on coming back this summer.

Beautiful accommodations, lovely home and yard. Very comfortable. Hosts were very friendly and cared about your comfort and stay. Will definitely return!! Cambridge is such a nice area with great restaurants and shops
We love staying at Gary's place, as this was a repeat visit. It's super comfortable, well-outfitted, conveniently located, and Gary is a very gracious house. Highly recommend!
Clean, roomy, and very quiet. Convenient location. Friendly and responsive host.
Very easy to check in, super affordable, the host was very nice and responded very quick with anything I needed

When I was walking towards the rental unit, the host came flailing out the front door to tell me that I needed to move my car. He didn't say "Welcome", "hello", not even a "hi". He came out to tell me to move my car and said nothing else at all. I was parked in the street. I knew right away how the stay was going to go. I was unable to relax in the space because it felt like I was being watched by a Scooby-Doo villain. It's a shame because it's a really nice place.
Gary was such a thoughtful host! He made our stay feel right at home. I wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy the beautiful space he curated. Absolutely lovely!

I would give Gary’s place six stars if I could. The house is charming and the guest suite is spacious, clean, and very comfortably furnished. The location is amazing, an easy ten minutes’ walk from Race Street and the restaurants even in December with a child in tow. We would love to come back.

This was a beautiful and squeaky clean space. The bedrooms were large and comfortable and the bathroom was pristine. The house is in a great location and is within walking distance of downtown restaurants and shops. Gary was very responsive, warm, and welcoming. Highly recommend.
A wonderful spot in Cambridge. Spacious, clean and convenient to shops and restaurants. Perfect!

Two very spacious bedrooms with an additional living room area for relaxing. The location is in a very walkable neighborhood and is conveniently located to many shops, restaurants, etc. Easy parking right outside and the host is local and very responsive should any needs arise. Highly recommend for your stay in Cambridge!
Gary’s place was beautiful and well maintained. His small private garden is lovely and the historic neighborhood is so quiet and charming. Gary was very responsive to my questions.
I loved it!

This is a simply superb place to stay. The space is spotless, well-appointed, and easy to access. It's a short stroll away from charming downtown Cambridge. Do yourself a favor, and book Gary's place for a perfect get-away.

Book it! Clean, comfortable, and well-located. You’ll get a great night of sleep, it’s quiet and the beds/linens are cozy. This spot is near to shops and dining in town and the neighborhood is charming. This stay is a great value!
Living area is clean, spacious and comfortable, and the location is great. Gary is a very caring and accommodating host.
Impeccably clean and comfortable. Host was a great communicator.
Beautiful space, excellent location, caring hosts. What more do you need?

Gary’s place was wonderful and met all of our needs for our one night visit. The beds were very comfortable and Gary was very responsive to our requests for information. The home is very modern and comfortable! We will stay again when we are in the area.
Lovely and comfortable home that is spacious and has a lovely yard. The neighborhood is convenient and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Clean, comfortable, and extremely convenient place to stay. Highly recommend. 12/10!!
Exactly as listed. So close to the downtown area but a quiet residential area. Great place will stay there again when I return to the area
This Airbnb is now my favorite and all time pic in Cambridge MD.

Very comfortable, clean, spacious, and convenient place to stay! The king bed was super comfortable and the main bedroom was perfectly laid out with everything we needed. The bathroom was also nice and spacious. Wish we got to use the outdoor space as it looked very pleasant. The house is located on a very cute street with nice houses, and just a short walk from downtown. Would definitely stay here again!
Excellent accommodations. Spacious and comfortable. Great location.
Just as quaint and cozy as listed. We had 100% rain the entire visit or we could have enjoyed the outdoor space
Nice place feels like staying at grandmas house for the weekend in a cool little town

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at the Oakley Suite! The neighborhood is charming and close to the water. The space was clean, comfortable, and well-stocked, with everything we needed. Very glad we stayed here and will return when in Cambridge again. Thank you, Gary and Hugo!
Gracious and thoughtful accommodations in a lovely neighborhood within walking distance to a cool town. Highly recommend.

Wonderful bed especially for the IronMan. Central location puts you a 10 min walk to town, swim site and finish line. Off the path enough parking was no issue. Impressive taste in cookbook authors, I wish I had time to glance through, hopefully next time! Probably not the best for location for small children but was an amazing getaway for athletes and adults!

Great place to stay in Cambridge, walking distance to many restaurants, cafés and the downtown district. Had a great night's sleep, very quiet and very clean. It felt very "homey" there. The parking was easy, wifi worked perfectly, great coffee.
Two spacious bedrooms upstairs and downstairs living room on a street in easy walking distance to downtown.

First time visiting Cambridge and can't wait to come back. Such a charming cottage near great shops and restaurants. Very clean and spacious. We enjoyed RAR brewery and Black Water Bakery. Choptank lighthouse was definitely worth touring.
What a delight!! I would have extended my stay if I didn’t have to work. I wanted to stay for days. :):)

Beautiful bungalow … perfect for a family of 4, even though it was only my hubby and I. Easy walking into town , Gary and Hugo are so friendly and accommodating … the back yard is just a beautiful oasis … a must stay if you come to Cambridge …

Nice and spacious place for 2-4 people. It’s a good value for the location and the amount of space. The hot water takes a bit long to heat up and runs out after a few uses, but overall not a big issue.

We had a very relaxing stay on our way home from Ocean City. The space was immaculate and beautifully decorated. Rooms were spacious and the bed was very comfortable. The coffee and water were welcome amenities and the info on local restaurants and attractions came in handy — we ate at Bombay Social and Black Water Bakery and they did not disappoint!
Very clean and comfy in great location, would definitely recommend!

Gary and Hugo's place is very comfortable and only a few blocks from the main street in Cambridge. The beds were nice and comfortable and the living room on the first level was nice for a wind down at the end of the night. We also really enjoyed the backyard garden with outdoor furniture. And Gary was on it with the bug spray and extra utensils for us! He's very helpful and super friendly.

Luxurious, spacious and comfortable. Three simple words that best describe Oakley. Easy to find with a convenient location, having two bedrooms - one with 1 bed and one with 2 beds - worked perfectly for us. The beds are comfortable, the bathroom spacious and the living room just right for unwinding after a long day. You can’t go wrong with choosing Gary’s Airbnb.
We felt so fortunate to stay here — it’s a beautiful, charming spot and an easy walk to downtown. Gary is top notch!

We loved our stay with Gary and Hugo! They truly went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and happy. The home was lovely and exactly as pictured. So clean and cozy. Had a nice time exploring Cambridge and neighboring eastern shore towns.
Great place, nice and comfortable, quality is definetly there.

Fantastic hosts and very relaxing decor-lovely back garden and many interesting books to chill out and peruse! Gary and Hugo are the best hosts ever-caring for our comfort and making sure we accomplished our history goal of following the Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Trail.

We had a great stay. The place was very clean, convenient, and Gary was communicative and so helpful and accommodating of our schedule with a young toddler. We had a great trip and highly recommend this place to stay!
Nice, beautiful, quiet, hospitable, all around great experience

The house and location are perfect. The water and town center restaurants are within blocks. The entire space is thoughtfully decorated and provisioned.. We had two separate stays in July. We completely enjoyed both stays. Kudos to our hosts. We’ll be back.
Gary was very responsive to our messages. The place was very clean & was exactly as presented on the Airbnb site. We appreciated the attention he put into making us feel welcome. Thank you!
Great hosts and beautiful house!

Perfect for our staycation, walking distance to the cute downtown area. Parking on the street is a breeze, check in was smooth, and communication was just the right amount with touching base but not being too much. Great stay, we would recommend and would come again!

I was traveling through the area for a night with two friends and was happy to find Gary's Airbnb was still available! The space is very clean and nicely decorated. We enjoyed the separate living room and outdoor patio space for lounging. The house is also very close to restaurants and cafes in downtown Cambridge. Gary was very responsive and easy to communicate with which was much appreciated. Definitely recommend!

This is an awesome location to stay at. You can't go wrong. The house is so pristine and provides you all the comforts of home you need. Gary is very personable and goes out of his way to make sure you're comfortable during your stay. The location is great as you're in walking distance to some of the major restaurants and shops in the area.
Beautiful accommodations, friendly hosts, convenient location.

If you're looking for the perfect little spot to stay in Cambridge, you've found it! This place is a treasure. Our stay here has set the bar high for Airbnb experiences. The home was beautiful, clean, and offered the space our family needed during our stay. Gary was a thoughtful host who was dedicated to making sure our stay was as easy as possible. He was kind, hospitable, and gracious, and we are looking forward to booking with him in the future!

Gary & Hugo are wonderful hosts. They also live in the main part of the house which was nice because they were right there to check on us and to offer suggestions of restaurants. The unit was spotless and well-equipped. The beds were extremely comfortable, and the rooms were spacious and gave us room to hang out in when we were "home." The home is situated in a lovely, quiet neighborhood, and we walked it nightly. If we stay in the area again, I definitely stay with them again.
Easy to get in, clean, inviting and comfortable!
Comfortable beds, large rooms & nice shower. Good value!
Nice place, clean, comfortable, good location, safe neighborhood, large bedrooms. It was nice to have two bedrooms with comfortable beds
Definitely clean and great place to stay!!
This suite is a great place to stay. It is immaculate, very well designed, and private. The garden is very pretty. Gary has thought of everything, and he answers questions almost immediately.
awesome stay! Gary was so welcoming and helpful.
Gary's space was beautiful and clean with a lovely little garden out back and a quiet neighborhood perfect for a lazy stroll.
wonderful hosts and a very comfortable place to stay!

Very beautifully appointed place, it would be ideal for a small family to stay here but my partner and I had a great time - and didn’t even require the use of the 2nd bedroom or the living room below, but knowing that they were there for us was lovely. There are thoughtful touches everywhere, Gary truly cares about his guests. If I were ever in Cambridge, MD again I would happily select this particular space again for a short term accommodation!
Super comfortable and convenient. The owner is very responsive. The space is great for a family with plenty of space.
Gary's place is a real find! Great location, clean, and well equipped. Highly recommend!
Very clean, cozy place to stay. Gary was very responsive and helpful with questions, check-in, and local recommendations. 15 min walk to town, 5 minutes to water's edge, very nice neighborhood.

Gary and Hugo were great hosts! The place is so cute and in a great location. Gary is great at communicating for anything you need or questions you have. I highly recommend staying there and will definitely stay there again if I visit Cambridge again!

This is perfect for staying on a quiet street within walking distance of shops and restaurants and exploring Cambridge on foot. The hosts have thought of everything to make your stay comfortable. The backyard is spectacular for reading and enjoying nature. A real bargain! Spread the word!
Cathy and Gary

Beautiful, super clean, and well appointed guest suite. The beds, pillows, and sheets were all incredibly comfortable! Loved the setup with the large rooms and kitchenette with a microwave, mini fridge, water, coffee. Lovely backward garden with nice seating and table. Communication and check in with Gary was perfect! On a beautiful street close to the water and town with gorgeous historic mansions nearby. Highly recommend!
Gary was a terrific host. Their home was very comfortable and clean. We had a very nice stay.
Everything was first rate every step of the way.

What a place! It’s a guest suite with every luxury you could want, including full privacy. We stayed with our toddler and it was totally cool - don’t miss Sailwinds playground! And Ava’s pizza is wonderful.

Gary's Oakley Suite is a perfect base to explore all that Cambridge and Dorchester County have to offer. It's a short walk down beautiful streets to delicious restaurants and a short drive to Harriet Tubman historic sites, Blackwater National Wildlife Refuge, 17th century churches, and not one but two "haunted" bridges. Great location, very comfortable, and Gary is super-responsive to any questions or requests. Highly recommended.
Will write independently
Lovely, extremely clean and comfortable. The host, Gary, was friendly and informative. He gave us great suggestions for places to eat in the area.
The place was very clean and communication was great! The place is very cute. I highly recommend and would definitely stay again!

Location, location, location! This suite is perfectly situated to be a quick walk to either the water front or downtown eateries. It was also very clean and comfortable. We'll definitely book here again when staying in Cambridge.
We had a fantastic experience and look forward to staying here again sometime! Thank you!!
This is a lovely suite. Beautifully decorated and perfectly located for our weekend in Cambridge.
I’m impressed with neatness and quiet atmosphere. Close to good restaurants, to water which is my favorite and morning walks. Best place to relax and unwind. Best communication with the owner ever.

Such a lovely place to stay - one of the best Airbnb's we've stayed in. The location is walkable to downtown, all the most important basics are provided (coffee, plates & utensils, shampoo, etc.) The apartment is spacious and so well decorated with fun books to read, terrific restaurant recommendations, brochures of historic walking tours (Cambridge was a hub for the Civil Rights movement). Loved it.
Gary's place is awesome! Very comfortable, clean, well-equipped and the bedrooms are super spacious. We also enjoyed Gary's beautiful hand-made holiday decorations. We definitely plan to be back!

A beautiful 2 bedrooms with a family room downstairs. Tastefully furnished (no overdone victorian furnishings!), comfortable beds in a nice neighbirhood. The outside of the home is beautiful, well designed and well kept.
The home was clean and perfect for our stay. Gary was a great host and provided wonderful restaurant suggestions. We had a great time
Good location, quiet and attractive residential neighborhood. Comfortable and spacious with nice back garden.
The guest suite is lovely -- quiet, wonderfully comfortable and very clean. The location is minutes away from great shopping and restaurants.
Gary’s place was perfect for our stay in Cambridge. It was very clean and perfect for our visit to the area. We are already looking forward to our next stay there.

A lovely place to get away from it all! You step into a cozy, comfortable living area, then upstairs to 2 enormous, beautifully decorated bedrooms and a bathroom. There's a mini-fridge stocked with water, and a small microwave, as well as some plates and utensils, which we appreciated.
There is also a beautiful garden and patio with tables. There's no place to eat inside but if the weather's good you can eat on the patio, though there are so many great restaurants located within easy walking distance of charming "downtown" Cambridge that you might not want to eat in! The home, located on a lovely, quiet street, is close to the Choptank River, and a short drive to the Blackwater Wildlife Refuge and Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Museum. So much to do in this area! We came for the many biking trails in this area, and Gary graciously let us stow our bikes in his garage. We had an amazing time and hope to come back again.
Gary is a tremendous host. The space is amazing and the recent upgrades make it over the top. There is no better place in Cambridge to stay.
Great comfortable place. Nice and clean. Good location
Ideal location for Ironman Maryland - very spacious bedrooms and living space. Basic kitchen amentities but able to make it work. Would 100% recommend.
The Suite is spacious, comfortable, scrupulously clean, and has everything you need for a great stay. Gary is the consummate host, friendly and carefully maintaining all the COVID protocols.
We loved this place! It was perfect and very clean. We loved the added touches of the coffee and tea. It was in walking distance to everything and we can't wait to come back!
Gary’s house was so great! We loved staying here — it was super comfy and cute. Gary was really sweet and accommodating and gave us lots of suggestions for things to do.
Gary’s place is great—clean, lots of space, and super close to walk to everything in Cambridge! This is a great rental for a weekend on the shore!
Very clean and quaint. Beautiful flower gardens. Great host communication.
This is a great place - clean, easy, and perfectly located for exploring the area.

Classy Airbnb experience. Nice decor, large bedrooms, super comfortable beds, spotless condition, delightful garden, nice coffee and good communication. Walk to beach and dining, which is a real plus. Indoor lighting is relaxingly muted, so you may need extra spot lighting. It was nice to meet Gary on the premises.

5 stars across the board! Great communication, extra clean, beautiful accommodations, spacious rooms, convenient location & all our needs & expectations met way beyond 100%!
Thank you Gary for making the process easy and for a wonderful, relaxing stay!
My family had a wonderful time at Gary's house. The rooms were clean and spacious, and the garden was beautiful. We loved that the house was walkable to the water and so many great restaurants.
Great place to stay for a night! Close to both the water and the local restaurants. Beautiful, comfortable space. Easy check-in. I would stay there again!
We had such a wonderful time! The house is so close to the water and to the down town area. We will be back soon!

I cannot recommend this property and the hosts enough. Super easy check-in with a message from Gary with instructions about parking and how to get inside. Place was impeccably clean and freshly vacuumed. The visual style of the property is beautiful: garden outside with vibrant flowers, fresh, soft linens and pillows, extras like a Keurig with coffee pods, cream, and sugar as well as multiple bottles of water in the mini fridge. Really nice and thoughtful touches like plastic cutlery and paper plates, napkins, shampoo/conditioner, and soap. Loved the decor of each room and the living room quarters. We had a lovely stay and cannot wait to return. The house stayed very cool with A/C on full blast, which was a welcome relief from the heat wave outside. Gary was immediately responsive to my messages and helpful with answering questions. Thank you for sharing your gorgeous home with us!

We had such a great time staying with Gary! His space is very clean, comfortable and has a cute outdoor set up where we had dinner. It’s walkable to town and the water! I’d definitely stay here again.

Spent two nights here with my wife and two children while visiting some family out on the lakes. Gary has a great rental with a beautiful garden, nice living room, two huge bedrooms, full bath and a cute kitchenette area complete with mini fridge, keurig machine, utensils, cups, etc. Definitely recommend.
Five star all the way. I felt welcomed and taken care of. Excellent. Quiet. Great location to visit other small towns. I went kayaking at the Black Water Refuge, so it was a convenient place to stay.
Gary thought of everything that would make your stay comfortable and relaxing! Their home is impeccable and lovely!

This place is wonderful! Quiet, clean, and all the amenities. Beds are comfy. Bathroom was spacious. Backyard is gorgeous, with plenty of sitting room. Gary is very responsive and helpful. Cute town. Recommend Black Water Cafe for breakfast and Theo’s was great!! We were in town to visit St Michael’s, which is roughly 30 minutes away. We used Elliott’s taxi service, brought us home too. Great trip!!

Gary’s place had 2 very spacious bedrooms with very comfortable beds.
Ample towels and linens were provided. Everything was clean and neat.
Beautiful garden and outside seating area. Would highly recommend staying here if you’re in the area.
Gary's place is appointed and quite comfortable. The gardens are lush & fabulous, plan to take advantage of spending some time there. Great coffee too.

absolutely lovely place and wonderful garden with nice outdoor seating.
very spacious and the unit was super clean and comfortable. easy check-in and check-out, and hosts were super nice and responsive to any questions. very convenient to restaurants.
highly recommend!

This suite is really nice. It was super clean and comfortable. Lot's of wonderful books, cookbooks, and art work. The gardens are just lovely and we enjoyed the patio in the backyard. It was very convenient to downtown Cambridge.

This suite was the perfect place to spend the night. It is very clean and the bedrooms are quite spacious. The backyard is landscaped beautifully and I enjoyed watching the birds visit the feeder. The internet service is excellent.

We stayed 3 nights and found it to be perfect for our needs. We did day trips each day to Assateague, Hooper's Island, Oxford and some others. Gary's place was clean, cozy, and spacious. Garden area was a treat.

Gary was very accommodating and communicative while we on our trip. Cambridge is a cute small town, we stopped here on our way to Annapolis from Assateague Island. The king bed was SO comfortable and the room was very cozy!The food at Bombay Social is a MUST HAVE during your stay absolutely delicious. A short 15 minute walk into a cute downtown. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a short getaway or quiet vacation!
The apartment is so cozy and clean. Centrally located. Perfect for a short getaway. Gary is an excellent host.

Gary is a great host. The place was well stocked with nice touches that took the experience above and beyond. Very clean. Bedrooms are very large. Outside patio is beautiful and the place was stylishly decorated. Great location near the water and we easily walked to restaurants and bars downtown. Highly recommend.

This is a super cute airbnb! The main house is beautiful and the garden is as well. Two big bedrooms with a nice living room and bathroom as well. There is a mini-kitchenette which was great for happy hour and snacks. Gary was a great host! 10/10
Fantastic place, location and comfort!
Great place in a perfect location with an attentive and responsive host - couldn't have been better.
Highly recommended. Comfortable, spacious and quiet. Easy walk to town. We'll be back.
Lovely and tidy. Many little thoughtful touches that made it a perfect stay. Highly recommend.
A mostly nice guest suite

Cute and cozy home in walking distance to the beach, pier and playground and a quick drive to everywhere we wanted to go. A really lovely place to stay for us and our 1.5 year old.

Excellent stay on a relaxed atmosphere and the hosts were very helpful but always respecting our privacy.
We absolutely loved your house. Beautifully decorated. The beds were so comfortable. We would. Definitely stay here again.

I/we had a great time in Cambridge celebrating a friend’s birthday. Pamela provided a binder full of helpful suggestions for things to do, restaurants to dine at and things to do. Our group did The Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Byway as suggested by Pamela. We ate at Salty’s Restaurant. The seafood was delicious! A Little Slice of Cambridge was perfect for our needs. The only thing I wished there was a fenced in yard. Look forward to visiting again. Thanks!
Evelyn n Phyllis

We were in Cambridge for my daughter's wedding and needed a place in between all the festivities. " Little Slice of Cambridge" was just the place for the downtime. It was very welcoming and clean. The beds were comfy and rooms spacious and the whole place unique and inviting. The only negative would be the small shower but it would not deter me to stay here again.

Excellent property. Clean, well maintained, comfortable. Older property, but thoughtfully updated with modern plumbing, electrical outlets, etc. Extremely walkable. Drive to shopping (groceries, etc) within easy range (1-2 miles/5 or so minutes). If we return to Cambridge it will be our first choice for a place to stay.

We had a wonderful stay here - the location was perfect and the apartment was well stocked with everything needed for young children. Pamela and Ric were what really made the visit special, though; they worked overtime to make sure our stay was a good one. Highly recommend!

Three of us really enjoyed our stay. The location was perfect (we walked to breakfast both days) and there was enough street parking for our two cars. One of the bedrooms had a squeaky door and Pamela and Ric took care of it immediately after I contacted them. The house was clean and quiet. The beds were very comfortable.
Four notes:
- There are window AC units, which are mentioned in the amenities section but I missed that. I slept comfortably even though I am temperature sensitive.
- The twin beds are short and one of them has a bed frame at the bottom. My 5' 10" friend slept on the twin bed without the frame at the bottom and his feet dangled.
- The shower is tight.
- There is an additional apartment on the second floor. I only heard someone walking up there once.
The Airbnb felt like home. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

We were in town for Ironman 70.3 Eagleman. Pamela's place is a great location to set up shop for the race. Easy to walk to both Gerry Boyle Park for the race expo / transition as well as walking into the main town center with all the shopping and dining.
The place was as advertised. Very clean, quiet evenings, comfortable bed. Check in and out were super easy.
If and when I decide to do the race again, I will certainly look into staying here again.
Would recommend. Even if it isn't for the race. A good central location for the area in general.
Wonderful home that had every thing we needed. Just the right place for a short getaway. Pamela was a terrific host. We would stay there again when in the area!
Pamela had nice touches including a popcorn maker and several games. The house was conveniently located to walk to town, restaurants and to the park by the water.

Little Slice of Cambridge is a lovely, unique apartment in a location that is walkable, close to cultural sites, near waterfront access, and restaurants. We were able to really immerse ourselves in Cambridge by being in town but also enjoyed relaxing in the living space which has a lot of nice touches. It is one of the few airbnb offerings that I have encountered that has a king bed which is a plus.

The location was fantastic and the house is nice and comfortable- a perfect place for anyone coming over for IMs or other races at Gerry Boyle. Beds super comfortable and nice amenities in the kitchen. Loved sitting on the front porch having coffee.
Nicely furnished, very clean, spacious 2 bedroom apartment in a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of restaurants. A good value. Ejoyed our stay.

Pamela’s place was delightful! A lovely older house, well cared for, well organized, and clean. Comfortable furniture in living room, all the amenities we needed in the kitchen (coffee, creamer, sweetener). Easy in and out. We loved sitting on the front porch! Just a cozy place to stay. I’d choose it again. 😊
Lovely space in a beautiful neighborhood! :) We had a blast in Cambridge.

A Little Slice of Cambridge is a beautiful home. It was larger than we expected. Very clean with thoughtful touches. We took our dog for a walk along the water - beautiful. We also walked to the Snapper restaurant for dinner twice during our stay. The tiki bar is a lot of fun and the food delicious. Took a day trip to St. Michaels. Thank you Pamela!

Fantastic!! Pamela's place is wonderful! The home is in a beautiful historic district. So many amazing homes in the neighborhood. The king size bed was the best!! It is stocked with everything you need for a short or long stay. The river front is just two blocks away. Pamela is very accommodating and responsive. Book this one! You won't be sorry!
Lovely and well kept place within a 10-15 minute walk of the downtown Cambridge strip. Everything we needed, warm, good wifi, appointed kitchen. Will stay here again on a future visit!
Cozy place in a surprisingly quiet neighborhood with plenty to do within walking distance.
Perfect place for a weekend getaway. Very clean, tidy, comfortable and has all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay. Great location, walkable to all Cambridge has to offer. Highly recommended

The house is old but very charming, it’s close to the water and some historic places in Dorchester County.
The host had plenty of disinfectant on hand if you needed to feel secure by doing some extra cleaning.
As always, a perfect place for our visits to Cambridge.
King size bed was extremely comfortable and the extra amenities were greatly appreciated
Really comfortable place in a cute town. Nice sites and restaurants within walking distance. Our kids loved the beds and the popcorn maker!
great value. convenient to area attractions and restaurants. nice amenities and thoughtful touches.
Had a great stay, was very cozy warm and clean. Great location to walk downtown and the water.

Lovely kid-friendly space with a top notch kitchen. Pamela has everything a family could want, and the space was spotless. The location is close to the water and several very good restaurants. If you can, visit the Harriet Tubman locations and the wildlife preserve
Pamela was a great host and quickly answered all our questions very quickly. It was a great space to stay in Cambridge. Thanks.
Great place - clean and well maintained and comfortable
The apartment is adorable and in a great location!! It was dog friendly for my two dogs which was awesome and she allowed me to check in a couple of hours early. Thank you!!
Very comfortable beds, very clean and relaxing home.
Great place! The owners provided timely responses. Would definitely visit again! Love walking through the neighborhood towards the historical district and river!
We had great stay, the apartment was fantastic. Pamela is a great hostess who provides all the necessities anyone would need while staying in temporary lodging.
Perfect location

Perfect location, an easy walk to downtown and to the waterfront. The apartment is roomy and very comfortable. We didn't eat there since there are so many great restaurants in Cambridge and nearby, but the kitchen was well equipped and we appreciated the coffee, creamer and snacks. Pamela is a great host. She always responded quickly to messages and was able to accomodate us for an early check-in. A great place to enjoy a visit to the Eastern Shore.

The house was clean. Quirky touches like the shark toilet paper holder and popcorn machine. Great location if staying for Eagleman or IMMD. Walkable to town. Window air conditioning units in both bedrooms and living room - they weren’t loud but did add some background noise; they worked very well and we had no issues even when it was blistering hot outside. Shower is a standup and small but has an aftermarket shower head with good pressure. There is an apt above and you could hear footsteps sometimes but not loud and we didn’t hear them at night.

We enjoyed our stay at Pamela's place, a convenient location within easy walking distance of Long Wharf Park (river front park with Yacht Club view), downtown Cambridge shops and restaurants. Short drive to national parks, attractions, and other waterside communities. One disappointment (over which our hostess had no control) was that many shops and restaurants in Cambridge and surrounding towns are closed Monday - Wednesday, so if you're looking for the full compliment of activities, Thursday - Sunday would be your best bet.
Everything was great. Plays looked better in person. Enjoyed my short stay! Thank you!
We enjoyed our stay at Little Slice of Cambridge! Beautiful accommodations with many nice touches!
Great location in a quiet neighborhood with easy walk to town. Great for families with young kids, lots of toys and books. Loved sitting on the porch at night listening to the crickets.

Nicely appointed spot walkable to the lighthouse and lots of restaurants in downtown Cambridge. Pamela was very responsive and check in/ out was effortless. This is the first floor of a two story house, though we never heard anyone moving around upstairs. It felt very private. Great location! Loved the living room and had a very comfortable king size bed. Would stay here again.
Great place
Funny apartment. Good for visiting New York. Near a great park that gives access to the staten Island beaches.

We booked Little Slice of Cambridge for our annual girl's weekend. However, it would be a great place for a family vacation as well. It is in a great location. We were able to walk to the restaurants and bars as well as the lighthouse. The town of Cambridge is adorable and is good for anyone looking for a low key, relaxing getaway. The house itself was very comfortable. The host included so many small, thoughtful touches that went above and beyond most Airbnb's that we have stayed at. We would definitely recommend a stay here.
This place is a true gem! Location is ideal for walking to town or the marina. The apartment is immaculately clean, very comfortable and cutely decorated. We look forward to staying there again.

We had a lovely stay at Pamela’s. The location within the historic area was walkable to restaurants and cafes, and quietly residential at night. She was very thoughtful with small details in the apartment, including having games, books, and small toys for our 2 young children. We’d love to come back!
Pamela's place was perfect for our weekend stay. Great location, clean, and all of the amenities you may need. I would definitely recommend!
Pam and Ric were very responsive and amazing hosts! Made our stay even better than expected!
Pamela's place was our home base for exploring Cambridge and the Blackwater refuge. Very comfortable stay and great communication.

Beyond incredible! Everything is exactly as described, perfect home for our weekend trip. We walked in to a spotless home with every amenity we needed or even thought we would need. The area is gorgeous, easy to walk around or drive a short way to town. We would 10000% stay here again.

Great place to stay! Affordable, easy to get to, easy to park, and very close to downtown.
The house is decorated, furnished, and supplied well to make the property feel comfortable and be easy on travelers. It feels like the owner thought of everything a family could need.
Furniture was clean and comfortable.
The WiFi came in very handy because cell service out here isn't great.
I could go on for a long time, but the point is this was a great stay

The location is PERFECT! Once we got there on Friday, we didn’t use our car again til we left on Sunday.
Neighbors were friendly.
And you could walk to so many good restaurants and historic places.
Now, we didn’t need a “luxurious bathroom” by any means, but the shower was very small. Now, my husband and I are big people (6ft+ tall), so it probably seemed extra small to us lol. However, that wouldn’t deter us from staying there again. Just FYI. The place was great!!
And if we had brought our kids it would’ve been great for them too.
The host was very nice and very easy to get ahold of. Such an amazing trip!!

Cute little place close to everything in Cambridge. I stayed here with just me an my dog and had a great time. Close to downtown and waterfront for easy walking. Cozy, comfortable and easy parking. Little touches that made my dog feel welcome. Everything I could ask for.

We had a great stay for mother's day! We were with my 7 month old daughter, and having the pack 'n play and highchair was really great, less things to worry about! The house was very neat & clean, and had everything we needed in the kitchen. It was a great stay and an easy walk to downtown. Would highly recommend!
A very comfortable apartment in a great location for exploring Cambridge and the surrounding area. Everything was just as we expected.

Brought the kids to Cambridge to do some stargazing at the Blackwater Refuge. Pamela’s home is in the historic district and just a few walkable minutes to restaurants, and the water. It was also a quick drive to the refuge which was helpful coming back late at night.
Pamela’s home is nautically decorated and in very nice shape (I LOVED the two arm chairs in her living room). Her home has everything you need with a fully stalked kitchen, bathroom towels were bright white and fluffy (another favorite!) Bedding was perfectly clean, and mattresses in both bedrooms were very comfortable! I’m sure we’ll be back!
We had a wonderful stay at Pamela's house. It was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our time in Cambridge.

Great place to stay! Very well appointed with lots of amenities for dogs and a great front porch for lounging. The town of Easton is very cute and an easy walk to all restaurants and bars.
We loved our stay and will be back!

Pamela's home was more spacious than expected, and in such a great location. Only two short blocks from the water and a few blocks from downtown. Very walkable. Her home was also very welcoming to both our toddler and our dog. Pamela suggested that we check out Emily's Produce, and I'm so glad we did! We ended up going twice during our weekend. We also walked down to the lighthouse and checked out some restaurants. Thank you Pamela, we will be back!

The location of the apartment is perfect! We felt like we could experience an authentic Eastern Shore neighborhood while being walking distance from great restaurants and the Harriett Tubman museum. The apartment had everything that we needed, was roomy but cozy, and tastefully decorated. The furniture and beds were super comfortable!
This place perfect for a weekend getaway with my family! Close to town, friendly neighborhood and great space. We'd definitely stay here again!

This was our first vacation with our 2 kids and dog since covid and Pamela could not have been more inviting! The spot was comfy and so great for kids - toys, games, pack and play and high chair! We had a great time visiting RAR and the Blackwater Refuge! Definitely recommend! Thanks again Pamela!
This is a very charming apartment. Super clean, beautiful nautical decor theme, and perfect location for our stay in Cambridge!!

5-Stars all around! Pamela provides a very warm welcome from the moment you make a reservation to when you walk through the front door into a comfortable, clean and cozy home away from home! Very thoughtful accommodations and sweet touches that incorporate a readiness for children and pets. Loved our stay!

This stay had great proximity to shops and attractions in Cambridge, and is centrally located to the Blackwater National Wildlife Refuge and many Harriet Tubman related sites. The apartment was clean and the kitchen had all the needed items to make meals.

My boyfriend and I visited for a quick weekend getaway and we’re delighted by our stay in Cambridge. We had breakfast at BlackWater Bakery+Eats, lunch at Ava’s (and returned at night for beignets ), and dinner at Portside (where my boyfriend ended up proposing!). I would highly recommended this stay. Plenty of amenities, close to all of the restaurants mentioned, and a very clean property.

We had a great time staying at Pamela’s house! The pack and play, high chair, and kid toys made our trip so much easier! She was very responsive to questions. We were able to walk to restaurants. Thanks!
Home was beautiful, we loved it. Perfect weekend getaway. Everything was as described and pictured.
Loved the house. it was set up very nice. had everything you could need for a short or long stay.

We had a great weekend away in Cambridge. Pamela and Ric left great notes for important items in the house, and they were very easy to get a hold of. The beds were comfy, there were toys & furniture to accommodate kids, and the popcorn machine was a fun surprise! It was easy to get to downtown, and their restaurant recommendations did not disappoint. Would highly recommend staying here for a family. The sleeping arrangements wouldn’t be ideal for couples, but it’s do-able. Overall, Little Slice of Cambridge is top notch!
Well kept and comfortable
Great location - easy walk to town. Place has everything you need!
Lovely well appointed apartment! Was easy to baby proof for our toddler and a great layout for traveling with kiddos. Thanks again!
Pamela's flat is very clean. It is nicely decorated and feels homey. The beds and pillows really comfortable. The location is an easy walk to restaurants.

This place is a gem! It’s beautiful, cozy and much bigger than we expected. It’s in a safe and friendly neighborhood. What really stood out were all the thoughtful touches: the many different types of glassware, bottled water, snacks, coffee, spices, kitchenware, toys & equipment for children (we don’t have any but I just kept thinking how kid friendly the apartment felt), a nightlight in every room and, of course, the popcorn machine! You can tell they put a lot of thought into making sure your every comfort is met. Loved it!
Cute place! Super clean! Thoughtful touches. Great communication
Great dog friendly airbnb.

Such a lovely place to stay!! It has the most amazingly comfortable master bed!!!
Everything was as described and the communication with Pamela and Ric was prompt.
Easy check in, the house book was informational and I could not have asked for a better place to stay.

Perfect weekend get-away spot--- near the water and some good restaurants.
Home was really comfortable
Good Coffee and even an old-fashioned popcorn maker with popcorn in the kitchen
Would recommend
Lovely and cozy home in a quiet neighborhood. Almost didn’t want to leave but hoping to stay here again in the future. Pamela does a great job of making a short stay feel like a home away from home.

Pamela's home was neat and clean and well located. We enjoyed our stay there and we would book again if we return to Cambridge. We would also recommend the Blue Ruin restaurant nearby where we had a delightful brunch.
Very clean house!! The shower stall was a little small but it worked!
Perfect jumping off point for touring the Harriet Tubman Byway and Museum and Blackwater Wildlife Refuge. Very cute and comfortable — just as advertised.
Great location. Super clean. Wonderful hosts!

Solid rental in a great location in Cambridge. Kitchen is spacious and well-appointed. I could tell the owners have made improvements to the apartment. Not as fancy as some of the offerings in the area, but it is a good value. I’d stay again.

What a wonderful place to stay! Plenty of space, comfortable accommodations, and a host who clearly goes the extra mile to add homey touches and make your stay as pleasant as possible. Location is great: close to the water and within walking distance of the historic downtown area, but in a nice, quiet neighborhood. A short drive to must-see places like Blackwater Wildlife Refuge. Highly recommend.

Not only was the house perfect for our long weekend in Cambridge, but Pamela was extremely accommodating during our stay. She provided clear and consistent communication along with great recommendations for food and activities. Definitely give Pamela’s place a try next time you are in the area!
Immaculate and thoughtfully appointed. Good location that is walkable to restaurants, bars and waterfront. Excellent value.

We had a wonderful stay and Wes and Deb's house! Large and roomy and very clean. Had everything you needed to make this a home away from home. We enjoyed the mix of old and new design and found the space very comfortable. We will definitely stay again next time we visit Cambridge!

lovely ranch house that was perfect for my family's needs. I suggest adding a few more hooks for towels in the bathroom, but aside from that we were very comfortable and had a pleasant stay. Thank you!

We found the house to be just right. T he mid century furnishings were very nicely done. We enjoyed the shuffleboard and the darts. We'll return on our next visit. Wes was very responsive to our questions. Thanks!
Beautiful home in a safe and quiet community. The hosts were very helpful and responsive. We enjoyed our stay at the retro home. Felt like home away from home. We will definitely come back.

Me and my family had to visit from GA very last minute and on our drive up we found Wes and Deb’s and immediately booked and we are so glad we did! It was so convenient due to our last minute circumstances to have a home where we could cook and fit our whole family. The game room was an amazing bonus! Everything was so clean and well taken care of! The hosts were so kind and understanding! If we come back to this area we will absolutely be staying here again!
Super neat place. Great decor and helpful hosts!
house as described, very comforable , we had a great time
Beautifully decorated in retro style. We admired the artwork throughout the house. The game room was fun. The owners were responsive when we had a question.

Wes and Deb's place was great! Cambridge is a very cute town and the house is in a beautiful neighborhood close to the main areas. Wes and Deb were very communicative before and throughout the trip and were responsive when we had an issue that needed their support. Highly recommend their spot!
Home was cute and comfortable! Everything you needed for a good stay was there. Checkout checklist was very reasonable.
Love the neighborhood
The house was wonderful. Exactly as described. It was perfect for a winter weekend getaway. Close to downtown but in a very quiet area.
Great house to stay at in Cambridge, was exactly what we needed!
Great place for the price. Nice neighborhood
This is a lovely home with a great backyard. It’s clean and has great living room and family spaces. Wes and Deb were quick to answer any questions. They are wonderful hosts.

This Retro House was very well maintained and well equipped. The bed was very comfortable and the amenities were great. There were no issues with the stay. I had a wonderful experience staying at Wes and Deb's home while I was attending a conference a the Hyatt, only about 10 minute or so drive away. I am very grateful to Wes and Deb for providing their home to me for a couple of days and would highly recommending their home to anyone interested in staying in Cambridge.
Exactly as described. Felt like home and we really enjoyed our stay

We enjoyed our stay in their comfortable home. We felt like we must have been the first guests to stay there, everything was fresh and clean. It was a relaxing home to spend time in, share some meals, and catch up with friends we hadn't seen for many years.

This was a nice house in a very quiet neighborhood. The house was very clean and looked just like the pictures online. We had a few questions that were answered very quickly by Wes and Deb. This was our first time at an Airbnb, and a great first experience.

We had a great stay. The Retro House was exactly as described. The house was clean and comfortable and everything we needed was there, from our morning coffee to the record collection. We would recommend it as a wonderful get-a-way location.
Denny and Joan

Beautiful house with great amenities. The kitchen had all brand new appliances. The couches and beds were especially comfortable. This house is only a mile away from downtown Cambridge with delicious local restaurants as well as grocery/department stores, while feeling cozy.
Very thankful for Wes & Deb! The space was great and their communication was excellent. Really enjoyed our stay here!
Great place for the Ironman race, was able to walk to transition and the finish line without having to worry about parking

We loved this home! It was super cozy in the perfect location! We enjoyed our family time together and everyone had more than enough space for the weekend! I would definitely recommend this home and if we ever come back to the area I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
The house was perfect for a weekend get a way. Good location for getting to many fun and enjoyable sites. I would stay again.
Wes & Deb were very quick to respond to questions. The house was well appointed and maintained. And I had a pleasant flashback with the retro 60's look. The record player was another real treat!

This place was absolute gem. From the retro theme bought me back when I was a younger person. The property was very clean and spacious for the couple days we stayed. We stayed as a girls time away to enjoy time together and this house was perfect fit for our little outing. We enjoyed the kitchen where we prepared our dinner the first night, nice to have new appliances to use that were very nice & clean. Everything was very comfortable even the neat game room it was fun to see the extra items we could use while there if we have had more time. But if we come back to the area we would like to extend a little more time to spend in this great property. Thanks Wes and Deb we enjoyed our little vacation in your wonderful home.

Beautiful house with great amenities. I especially appreciated the coffee machine with starbucks drip coffee each morning. The kitchen had all brand new appliances. The couches and beds were especially comfortable. Relaxing in the game room with music from vinyl was an experience unlike one I have ever had in an AirBnb to date. Truly lovely.
This house is only a mile away from downtown Cambridge with delicious local restaurants as well as grocery/department stores, while feeling cozy and out of the way on a small dead end street.
It was a fantastic place to stay. Wes and Deb were great hosts and the house was easy to get in and out of. It was nicely decorated and close to a lot of amenities.

Wes and Deb's place is spotlessly clean, tastefully decorated, and thoughtfully curated with everything to make for a comfortable stay. The game room with record player was a fun surprise! I would happily stay again.

Cant say enough how much we enjoyed staying in this home! Very clean and many ways to enjoy some time together as a family! Host was great and very responsive whenever we needed something. Would highly recommend this home!

The oven did not work, and I notified the owner upon arrival. Two days later it was determined by the owner the oven would need to be replaced. Therefore, I spent the entire stay without the ability to cook. There were bugs and dirt throughout the house, holes in the wall, and peeling paint. There was an odor in the house and rust on the mirrors in the main bathroom as well as a large stain on the top of the tub. I have rented numerous Airbnbs and this one was the most disappointing. Many repairs and a deep cleaning need to happen for this to be a true rental and to reflect what I have learned are top standards of hosts who care about renters.
Very responsive host that worked hard to make it a great stay. Close to the Ironman course for those training or racing!
Great place to stay and get around St Michaels, Cambridge, and extremely close to Blackwater Refuge. Peaceful garden with birds galore.

Kathy and Rick are wonderful hosts. They are so welcoming, and made us feel right at home. We enjoyed wonderful conversations. The surroundings are so peaceful and beautiful. The apartment is spotless, and full of thoughtful touches for the traveler, like the two folding luggage racks in the bedroom. We are already planning a return visit.

Kathy and Rick were so welcoming and friendly. They provided some great recommendations. The property is beautiful and peaceful. We really enjoyed sitting outside and observing the great variety of birds! Thank you so much!

This is our second visit to Kathy and Rick’s place. Every time we make plans to visit the area, we will hope to stay here. It’s ideal for us. Thanks so much, Kathy and Rick. We continue to recommend it to all our family and friends!

Kathy and Rick helped make our stay on the Eastern Shore a memorable one. They gave us a bunch of great recommendations for things to do in the area, showed us around their lovely tree farm, and even had some delicious fruit bread waiting for us on our arrival. We would definitely recommend the place!

We had a really comfortable and relaxing stay at Kathy And Rick’s place. The place was beautiful, full of thoughtful touches, and you could simply sit all day and watch the birds in the garden. Their forest and farm is a treat to explore. It is conveniently located close to Blackwater NWR, a haven for birdwatching. Kathy and Rick are two of the loveliest hosts we've met. This place comes highly recommended!
we had a wonderful stay! rick and kathy were very helpful and the area is worth a visit. we felt very much at home.
Kathy and Rick are amazing hosts. They welcome you like family. Their farm is a true oasis on the bay, perfect for any occasion.

This is my 4th or 5th stay at Kathy and Rick's place due to the close proximity to my Dads house and it's always a great stay! I feel right at home and comfortable in this space and it is always clean, comfortable and just what I need! Thank you for another great stay!

The property is a piece of Heaven, quiet, walkable, peaceful (except for duck hunters on nearby property).
but they gave me a bright orange vest to wear so I was safe. Kathy and Rick have very friendly personalities, were available when I wanted to talk and allowed me time and space for my own retreat. I was able to read and write in a way I just can't focus in the city. The apt was comfortable and warm as I requested. There was no stove yet with with their microwave and my hotplate, I got along just fine. Being near Blackwater was great and there are also other spots on the water to explore.

My son and grandson enjoyed their stay over Christmas very much. They felt welcomed and were comfortable. It was close enough to our house to be a useful choice. And the scones were outstanding! Thanks.

This was my third stay at Kathy and Rick's place. It is the perfect location to visit my family in MD and the space is just what I need when I am in town. Kathy and Rick are very friendly and communicative and go above and beyond to make sure you have a great stay. The delicious baked goods don't hurt either! :)

Kathy and Rick are wonderful hosts. We enjoyed our stay. The trees and farmland were gorgeous. Wish we had more time to stay and will return.
They were considerate, friendly and kind throughout our stay.
Our homemade treats were so delicious.
As first time guests, we felt like part of their family. It was truly delightful!
Second time staying here and I’m sure we will be back! Peaceful & comfortable stay and gracious and kind hosts!

Had a great stay at Kathy and Rick’s place. Wish I had more time to explore the property but will certainly be back and will do so then. Kathy made the most delicious baked goods and was very kind and welcoming upon arrival! The place was spacious and had everything I needed to stay and take work calls.
Second time staying with Rick and Kathy and always a pleasure. Their place and hospitality are amazing.
The hosts were very friendly and made us feel welcome.
This place is awesome. Great hosts that treated us like family!

Traveled to the area for a wedding on Hoopers Island. This location was closer to the venue than hotels in Cambridge. Private entrance, which I appreciated, as well as a full kitchen and living space. My only complaint is that it is not contactless entry, but otherwise, was great for the purpose that I used it.

Kathy and Rick were wonderful hosts who welcomed me and helped me with my bike and bags. Kathy is a wonderful baker and shared a piece of chocolate cake she had just baked. She also left me delicious bread slices that I nibbled on for 5 days. The accommodations were lovely. Having 3 rooms to hunker down in during a tropical storm was delightful. My hosts suggested sites to see and places to eat once the weather improved. I look forward to coming back sometime in the future.
Perfect stay. Beautiful space. Excellent people, very friendly and helpful.

We found this place at the last minute and it was such a find. Their farm is lovely, close to water, and there is great cycling in the area. The place is spotless and comfy (although you can hear voices from the main part of the house). I would gladly stay again if I was heading to that part of the world. We even came home with fresh eggs from their hen house! It was a nice place to relax.

Rick and Kathy are exactly as the reviews say - warm, welcoming, and friendly. Their place is much more than a great place to stay, it's a restful and relaxing farm with places to sit and swing, places outside to eat dinner, and places to walk. It's a great place to slow down. We so enjoyed their place. They were wonderful hosts.

This is a perfect quiet rural getaway. As mentioned in previous reviews, Rick and Kathy are warm and wonderful hosts.
We have never stayed on a tree farm before, and it was so interesting to read about the work they ave done to preserve this beautiful environment.
The Blackwater National Wildlife Refuge refuge is just a few miles away. We went there three times and saw our first bald eagle.
Kathy is a professional baker and we may have happily gained five pounds during our four nights day.
If we are fortunate enough to return, we’d love to explore their walking trails.

We loved our time at Kathy and Rick's cozy hideaway amongst the pine trees. We enjoyed quiet time on the glider under the pergola, and a long walk on the beautiful wide path through the pine forest. Their location was a good base for our exploration of Dorchester County's history, including the Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad National Historical Park in Church Creek and the Harriet Tubman Museum in Cambridge. Kathy and Rick gave us good recommendations on local Cambridge restaurants. Overall, a perfect weekend.

We had a wonderful stay with Kathy & Rick. They were there to greet us and show us the lovely space attached to their home. In addition to this space, they let us explore the whole property and so we were able to use the grill to cook outside and eat in the screened room, bike the trails, visit with the chickens, and drive to the pond. Kathy & Rick were very hospitable and provided extra touches that I appreciated like a breakfast treat, coffee & teas, brochures and maps of the surrounding area, and great advice on places to dine an explore. When we needed something they were very responsive and let us use some of their kitchen items to cook. I'd stay here again-- though would come better equipped for swarms of mosquitos! :)

I can't say enough nice things about staying at Kathy and Rick's place. They really do want you to have a great experience and will help you with whatever you need. The apartment has plenty of privacy and was easy to work from if needed. Amazing access to all of the surrounding nature and also Cambridge is just a stone's throw away. Thanks again for the great hospitality and wishing you all lots of joy.

Kathy & Rick are wonderful hosts--genuinely warm and hospitable. They were proactively helpful, and also provided much privacy. The unit has many thoughtful touches--including delicious cake from a local bakery! The bed is GREAT!
The property is a certified tree farm, so lots of woods with trails, lots of wonderful birds--I saw a red-headed woodpecker for the first time in my life! (and I'm a birder!). And they have four gorgeous, amusing, talkative hens, "The Girls," who enjoy having the guests visit with them.
I will happily return to this property the next time I need a fairly local get-away retreat.

An excellent home base for exploring Cambridge, Blackwater Natural Wildlife Refuge and the surrounding area. Rick and Kathy were so kind and beyond helpful and the space was comfortable and well appointed.

We really enjoyed our stay at Kathy and Rick’s farm. They were so welcoming and made us feel right at home. The farm is a lovely spot and we enjoyed watching the many different birds that came to their bird feeders. Blackwater National refuge is beautiful and we enjoyed hiking there. We hope to come back again sometime. Highly recommend!
Awesome place to relax, kid friendly, great fishing, and very hospitable hosts. would definitely go back.
Wonderful hosts. Very helpful and very accommodating. Hope to stay again some day.

We thoroughly enjoyed our 6th wedding anniversary trip to an amazing place full of history and beautiful nature. We loved walking through the mixed forest. We were humbled by the beautiful Blackwater nwr. As hosts, Kathy and Rick were warm, welcoming, and generous. The place had everything we needed and then some. The bed was soft and comfortable, the living area very clean and cozy. After acquiring some provisions from the country store, we got seafood from Lindy's and made a great dinner in the little counter-top oven. We really wish we had more time to spend at this perfect location!

My husband was racing in the Eagleman triathlon in Cambridge, and we were looking for a quiet place to call home for the weekend. Kathy and Rick’s place was perfect. We enjoyed their outdoor seating area one afternoon, where we saw a red headed woodpecker, goldfinch, and hummingbird. Very peaceful and relaxing.
Kathy and Rick were very friendly and kind, giving us local dinner recommendations, and even surprising us with a goodie bag the day of the race.
If we had more time, we’d enjoy exploring the wetlands their home backs up to.
Highly recommend!

Kathy and Rick provide an amazing AirBNB! I had travelled here with my best friend to go kayak snakehead fishing. There was plenty of space to park both our boat trailer and the truck. Kathy and Rick greeted us when we arrived and where everything welcoming. We were invited to use any of the decks/pavilions as well as to walk the trails and visit/fish the pond. I caught half a dozen bass at the pond and greatly enjoyed watching the various wildlife. Rick took us on a tour of the farm and was a great and informative guide.
I will definitely use their AirBNB again if I travel back to this area. Thank you Kathy and Rick for being such awesome hosts!

This was our second time here because we loved it so much the first time. Kathy and Rick have created an oasis. The home is spotless, comfortable, and well equipped. It is exactly as described in the listing. The grounds are extensive and have a pond and walking trails. The bird feeders are full and they attract all sorts of birds. My favorite was the red-headed woodpecker. There are several beautiful places to sit outside and watch the birds. We came to the area to visit Blackwater NWR so this location couldn't be better. Kathy and Rick are wonderful hosts. They greeted us when we arrived and were always available with suggestions on where to go and had wonderful stories to tell. You can engage with them as much or as little as you want. After an evening toasting hot dogs and marshmallows with them over the fire pit, they seem more like friends than hosts. We will have to go back a third time.
Fabulous hosts, lovely surroundings, very comfortable bed, definitely exceeded our expectations!!

Amazing stay- our hosts were very friendly and helpful - they went above and beyond. Accommodation was perfect and location very peaceful and relaxing. Lovely walks around property and wonderful wildlife- we saw an Osprey nest with a chick during one of our walks on the property. Would definitely recommend and plan to return in the future!

We had a wonderful stay with Kathy and Rick at Madison Nature Getaway. The farm is beautifully maintained with numerous trails and lots to explore. Easy day trips of 15-40 mins to a number of local Eastern Shore attractions: Blackwater Refuge, Harriet Tubman Center, Cambridge, Oxford, St. Michaels, etc. Kathy and Rick were extremely friendly and made for gracious hosts. The accommodations were just as advertised and were very clean and comfortable. We will definitely be back.

Rick and Kathy did everything possible to make our stay a pleasure. They were the most considerate and welcoming hosts we've ever had for Airbnb. We enjoyed their company and their recommendations. We enjoyed talking with them and walking on their tree farm and learned so much about the area. Their place is a treasure.

We had such a comfortable, peaceful stay at Kathy and Rick's! We enjoyed their walking trails and many outdoor sitting areas. They made us feel right at home with a well-stocked kitchen and cozy living and sleeping areas. Kathy and Rick are wonderful, responsive hosts.
This is a fantastic get-away for a single person, couple, or family with small kids.
We look forward to staying here again!

Super quiet and comfortable indoors. Great outdoor setting with lots of wooded paths and a nearby pond with a photo blind for enjoying birds and other wildlife. Hosts were super communicative and helpful - a truly delightful couple. Can't wait to visit again. Close to Cambridge and Blackwater NWR.

Wonderful stay. Have been here twice before and love the peacefulness that their place and grounds bring us. We hiked their property and enjoyed the coziness of their place. Great place to disconnect. Kathy and Rick are very hospitable and friendly.

Kathy and Rick were great hosts. From the moment we arrived they were friendly and quick to offer lots of info about the local area and even show us around the farm. We brought our 9-month old baby with us and the space was great for the three of us. We brought a pack and play and the baby slept in the kitchen area. We had a lovely weekend exploring the area and checking out some of the local wildlife. We really liked the Harriet Tubman visitor center and the Blackwater wildlife preserve.
Very nice people but don’t expect privacy.
